Рассадник долбаёбов, ЧСВ детей которых нужно хорошенько уебать, игра для тех кому не жалко пух на жопе, потому что от этого комьюнити пригорает не по детски. Ёбанная шарашкина контора без нормального анти-чита, и невидимые текстуры от которых твои гранаты летят тебе же под ноги. Хуйня полная. Не советую.

A game where hackers are only getting better at hiding the fact that they are hacking... this makes it very difficult to tell whether the enemy team is dominating because they are good, or whether they have hackers... This results in an incredibly frustrating experience. I would recommend to play Valorant instead - the other day a match I was having on Valorant got cancelled MID GAME because there was a hacker on the enemy team... 

Valve need to take notes, make a new cs with a focus on quality anti-cheat (doubt this will happen since they are still profiting enormously from csgo) or fix the current one. Its a shame too because CS GO is such a great game. Sad to see this is the fate of a game that I love and spent many hours playing. Oh well, all good things come to an end.....
